Articles.Content:
While I am far from great at building ships, this little heap actually did more than go to Mun and back it also went on to Minimus on my third mission. I am sure it is over kill on power for such a small craft, but better safe than sorry. This thing only has 5 stages and 97 parts, a majority of it struts to ensure safety. My original design has a capsule I changed it to the lander can, mostly for my viewing out the window

While this is on with the capsule on it it still is an impressive shot.

Here is the main sail of the ship all the way out near Minimus, I never honestly thought I would make it there with fuel to spare ion that thing.

One of the nicest shots I have taken to date a sunset on Minimus, or maybe it was a sunrise I cannot remember now though.
